text: A glance at the gauge marks at the bottom end reveals when the required amount has been removed, and if care is taken to stop the plane short of the squared pencil line at the top, the work will be accurate. The straight-edge can be used to test the straightness of the sides.
handwritten_text: A glance at the gauge marks at the bottom end reveals when the required amount has been removed, and if care is taken to stop the plane short of the squared pencil line at the top, the work will be accurate. The straight-edge can be used to test the straightness of the sides.
